nodes.text: The T-40 Flitter was a model of flitter built by Incom Corporation during the Galactic Civil War. They were armed with a double laser cannon for police and paramilitary use.
60 were employed at the main Lianna spaceport for security in the time after the Battle of Yavin.
T-40 Flitters appear in West End Games' roleplaying game adventure book Mission to Lianna.
